title: Fragments, 19th century
description: Dark blue silk ground with all-over close embroidery in silks which were originally polychrome, but are now tan. Design on body of piece of profile peacocks alternating with flowering branches. Border of blossoms alternating with peacocks with spread feathers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered. 1937-35-12-a,b.
